note.p: Small business owner. Ran a Berlin wool and fancy-work shop with premises at 35 Leece Street, Liverpool, 1881; in Chester, 1891; living in Ambleside, Westmorland, 1911.
Census returns of England and Wales 1881 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG11/3624/88/6), 1891 (RG12/2864/10/14), 1911 (RG14/31611)
